message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $14000 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to get a good deal, but I think the product is worth more than that. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $13500.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $13000.
I understand that you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I think the product is worth more than that. I'm willing to make another concession and sell it to you for $13250.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. Considering the market value and my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $13000.

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're not going to reach an agreement, Bob. However, I'm willing to make one more concession to try to get a deal done. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $13100.
I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement, Alice. Considering the current market conditions and my budget, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $13000.
Bob, I'm not willing to go any lower than this. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $13050, but that's my final offer.
I've carefully considered your offers, Alice. Based on my research and budget constraints, I am willing to pay $13000 for the product.
